Name: Project Budget Constraint
Description: Project budget must not be exceeded

Name: Team Size Constraint
Description: Team size must be within predefined limits

Name: Employee Availability Constraint
Description: Employees must be available for assigned sprint tasks

Name: Skill Match for Task
Description: Employees assigned to tasks must have the required skills

Name: Sprint Duration Constraint
Description: Sprint must start and end within fixed dates

Name: Sprint Goal Achievement
Description: Sprint goals must be achieved at a minimum level

Name: Blocker Limit
Description: Number of unresolved blockers should not exceed threshold

Name: Release Plan Feature Coverage
Description: Release plan must include all critical features

Name: Task Effort Limits
Description: Tasks should have effort estimates within min and max

Name: Product Backlog Status
Description: Product backlog status must be active to proceed with sprint planning
